Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties and methods of the <font face="courier new">DataSet</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property specifies or retrieves the locale information used to compare strings in a table.
This property specifies or retrieves the <font face="Courier New">DataSet</font> name.
This method removes rows in all the tables.
This method retrieves the type of the current instance.
This method retrieves XML schema and data into the <font face="Courier New">DataSet</font>.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(4), (B)-(5), (C)-(2), (D)-(3), and (E)-(1).
